column5: went to lefroy today, went straight on the ice with my car, didnt feel like walking, the ice is about 14-16", cought couple of perches in 20fow, then moved further and found a 13fow spot - nothing, then moved further into the bay, the depth was 30fow, non stop perch action, my buddy and me did our limit and went home. didn't catch any major beasts but saw a guy in the hut beside us cought a real monster.
